description_top: Commentary on the Mishnah (Sanhedrin 10 [Ḥeleḳ Pereḳ] and Avot) with additional texts
catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Commentary on the Mishnah (Sanhedrin 10 [Ḥeleḳ Pereḳ] and Avot) with additional texts
author: Maimonides, Moses
description: Contents: Commentary on the Mishnah (Sanhedrin 10 [Ḥeleḳ Pereḳ) (ff. 1v-10v). Commentary on the Mishnah (Avot) (ff. 10v-50v). Questions and answers and Mishnah Avot 6 (ff. 50v-54r).
